# Release Notes Template

Use this template when creating GitHub releases. Copy and fill in the details below.

---

## Release v{VERSION}

### Downloads

**For End Users (No Build Required):**
- Download `wp-image-optimiser-dist-{VERSION}.zip` - Pre-built version ready to serve

**For Developers:**
- Download `wp-image-optimiser-source-{VERSION}.zip` - Full source code

### What's New

<!-- List new features, improvements, and bug fixes here -->
- Feature 1
- Feature 2
- Bug fix 1

### Installation

See [README_INSTALL.md](https://github.com/Aersida-Applied-IT/wp-image-optimiser/blob/main/README_INSTALL.md) for detailed installation instructions.

### Quick Start (Pre-built Version)

1. Download `wp-image-optimiser-dist-{VERSION}.zip`
2. Extract the ZIP file
3. Navigate to the extracted folder
4. Run `serve-dist.bat` (Windows) or `./serve-dist.sh` (Mac/Linux)
5. Open http://localhost:9081 in your browser

### Quick Start (Source Code)

1. Download `wp-image-optimiser-source-{VERSION}.zip`
2. Extract the ZIP file
3. Install prerequisites (Node.js 24 LTS and pnpm) - see [README_INSTALL.md](https://github.com/Aersida-Applied-IT/wp-image-optimiser/blob/main/README_INSTALL.md)
4. Run `pnpm install` to install dependencies
5. Run `start-app.bat` (Windows) or `./start-app.sh` (Mac/Linux)
